short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ziptab lets you effortlessly save and organize your open tabs into groups, so you can easily pick up right where you left off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ziptab lets you effortlessly save and organize your open tabs into customizable groups, so you can easily pick up right where you left off. Perfect for multitaskers, students, and busy professionals, Ziptab ensures you never lose track of important tabs. Save time, stay organized, and streamline your browsing experience with Ziptab!
